title: Cant spectate please help resolve
body: Haven't been able to spectate for close to 3 weeks now any tech supp help would be  great. Thanks. when I go to spectate someone the option is just greyed out every time regardless of game mode.

replies.body:
The spectate feature hasn't been added into the *Beta Client* just yet. You can still access this feature if you launch into the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=e1RWO49M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-08T03:49:25.993+0000)
>
> The spectate feature hasn't been added into the *Beta Client* just yet. You can still access this feature if you launch into the Legacy Client from the login screen:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Thank
